Package SalesReport

Class SalesReportUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.UI
      • SalesReport.SalesReportUI
  • public class SalesReportUI
extends UI
    To display data related to Sales Report. First, it will display the possible options for a sales report which is the either "daily" or "monthly".
    Author:
    Wai Yar Aung

      • printByMonth

        public void printByMonth​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Float> dailyTotals,
                         float total)
        Called when the model's type == "MONTH". Prints a table that shows the daily total for the entire month selected as well as a bar chart to visualize the same data.
        Parameters:
        dailyTotals - This HashMap has the date for key and total for value.
        total - The session's total

      • printByDay

        public void printByDay​(java.util.List<OrderInvoice> invoices,
                       float total)
        Called when the model's type == "DAY". Prints the invoices for the entire day. Each invoice will have their time, price and orders printed.
        Parameters:
        invoices - The invoices for the day
        total - The session's total
